PARAMETER.NAME: USE_DATANODE_HOSTNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1') OR (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN') OR (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5') OR (DB_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR'))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KRB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: isShow[DISTRIBUTION] AND ((((DB_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0') OR (DB_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR') OR (DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0')) AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='HORTONWORKS') OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (DB_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3')))

PARAMETER.NAME: GROUP
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='MAPR') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (DB_VERSION=='MapR_EMR' OR DB_VERSION=='APACHE_0_20_2')) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND AUTHENTICATION_MODE=='UGI'))

PARAMETER.NAME: NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: NOTE : Only boolean, byte, byte[], double, float, integer, long, short, string are currently supported for key class and value columns fields

PARAMETER.NAME: COMPRESS_NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: NOTE : Only support Linux client and hadoop native code is necessary, also need to add the native code path to $java.library.path

IMPORT.NAME: hadoop-conf-kerberos
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR DB_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1' OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION=='false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

IMPORT.NAME: jetty-util
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR DB_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1' OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION=='false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

IMPORT.NAME: jersey-core
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR DB_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION=='false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

IMPORT.NAME: commons-io
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1' OR DB_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1' OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR DB_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR DB_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION=='false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')
